For SRS  can also use Endowus to buy LionInfinity 500?
Select goal Fund Smart > Lion global Infinity US500
Personally which do u think is better? Dimensional or Lion?

Dimensional is a cheaper fund due to low expense ratio and it covers international companies.Lion us500 is US concentrated and slightly higher expense ratio but 2021 performance has been great for them.

Hi Chris  for IBKR  is it better to deposit SGD into the account then currency convert to USD? Or deposit USD straight into the account?
Anyone kept $10k in Tiq before? If you cash out everythinf and left only $50 the policy still covers you?
deposit sgd and convert on platform
Ok thanks BT.Does the IBKR account comes with margin already?
Default is cash account  you will need to request in order to convert to margin
so sometimes after you convert to USD you may not able to use the USD to buy shares immediately  back end they will need some time to settle it first
Looks like I need to find the place to request to convert to margin
TDA interest rate higher than IBKR
yeah need to configure the account first  answering  a couple of questions etc

Once you have margin  you don't have to wait for the cash settlement to start buying stocks. But please read up on the margin requirement and avoid leverage up your portfolio to the extend that you are at risk of liquidation
Agree with whatever Boon Tee said about IB. Just apply for margin for convenience
Can I transfer my stocks from moomoo & poems over to IB?

do you guys discuss US stocks here?
Better to just sell your holdings there and buy back at IB  less hassle
IB takes a few hours to deposit  but usually same day if it is a working day
You can post a question and see if there is any taker
but please don't ask vague questions like"What do you think of TSLA stock""Why market drop today"I think all these are really low dimension quesitons
